review.title: “Supervisor”
review.pros: Pros – It is really only one of about 4 places to work in London, KY. Plus, employes get to drink free milk while there.
review.cons: Cons – Union environment suffocates real growth and potential. Bitter union employees hold union rules to their advantage in all situations making simple tasks difficult to manage.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Systematically break union structure and hire workers willing to work hard to support company goals. Create a company culture that drives productivity and profitability.
